dataset_info.title: 2025 NFL Playoffs - 5 Major Games Complete Dataset
dataset_info.description: Comprehensive timestamped data for 5 major 2025 NFL playoff games with play-by-play, commercials, key events, and real-time marketing opportunities
dataset_info.use_case: AI-powered real-time marketing tool for medium-sized businesses

games.title: AFC Championship Game
games.location: Empower Field at Mile High, Denver, CO
games.weather: 26¬∞F at kickoff, snow began at halftime, 16¬∞F at end
games.narrative: Snow-filled defensive battle. Drake Maye's rushing TD and Christian Gonzalez's late INT seal Patriots' 12th Super Bowl berth.
games.key_moment: Jarrett Stidham's fumble in Q2 changed momentum completely

q1.marketing_window: Broncos dominating, Denver market highly engaged

key_plays: 3:43 PM - Patriots 4th down stop at NE 20
q2.marketing_window: Massive momentum shift, Patriots rally time

halftime.viewer_behavior: 75% on phones, bathroom breaks, food orders spike
halftime.marketing_window: Mobile-first promos critical, easy checkout essential

key_plays: 5:32 PM - Christian Gonzalez INT seals it
q4.marketing_window: Game sealed, Super Bowl promos activate immediately

top_marketing_opportunities: Snow game = toughness/authenticity messaging
Patriots underdog comeback story
Drake Maye scrambling ability = highlight-reel content
New England market explosion after win
Denver consolation messaging needed
Super Bowl LX tickets/travel packages immediate spike

games.title: NFC Championship Game
games.narrative: High-scoring offensive showcase. Sam Darnold outduels Matthew Stafford. Seahawks defense holds late to reach Super Bowl.
games.key_moment: Rams drove to SEA 12 with 6:29 left but got ZERO points (turnover on downs)

key_plays: 6:45 PM - Kenneth Walker III 8-yard TD run
q1.marketing_window: Seahawks hot start, Seattle market energized

key_plays: 7:15 PM - Stafford to Puka Nacua 44-yard bomb
7:18 PM - Stafford to Davante Adams 23-yard TD
7:28 PM - Darnold to Jake Bobo 17-yard TD (34 seconds before half!)
q2.marketing_window: Shootout developing, fantasy-style scoring appeals to younger audience

halftime.viewer_behavior: High engagement due to exciting first half

key_plays: 8:20 PM - Darnold to Cooper Kupp 13-yard TD (ex-Ram revenge narrative!)
q3.marketing_window: Seahawks pulling away, Rams fans anxious

key_plays: 9:05 PM - Stafford to Adams 8-yard TD (cut to 31-27)
9:15 PM - Rams drive to SEA 12, but TURNOVER ON DOWNS!
q4.social_spike: Cooper Kupp TD against former team = MASSIVE viral moment
q4.marketing_window: Late drama, Super Bowl berth secured, celebration mode

viral_moments: Cooper Kupp TD against Rams (ex-team) = 22,400 mentions/minute
Puka Nacua 225 yards but team loses
Super Bowl XLIX rematch set (Patriots revenge angle)
top_marketing_opportunities: Sam Darnold redemption story = underdog narrative gold
Cooper Kupp ex-Ram revenge = relationship/betrayal content
High-scoring game = party atmosphere, food/drink push
Seattle market celebration mode
LA market consolation needed
Super Bowl XLIX rematch hype (2015 callback)

games.title: AFC Divisional Round
games.location: Empower Field at Mile High, Denver, CO
games.narrative: Thriller goes to overtime! Bo Nix outduels Josh Allen in instant classic. Broncos advance on walk-off FG.
games.key_moment: Overtime drama - both teams punted first, then Broncos INT led to game-winning FG

key_plays: 4:38 PM - Josh Allen 22-yard TD pass to Keon Coleman
q1.marketing_window: Josh Allen early dominance, Bills Mafia energized

key_plays: 5:10 PM - Bo Nix to Courtland Sutton 35-yard TD
5:22 PM - Allen to Dalton Kincaid 8-yard TD
5:35 PM - Nix to Marvin Mims 18-yard TD
q2.marketing_window: Offensive explosion, both fanbases on edge

halftime.marketing_window: Close game = maximum engagement, no one leaves

q3.marketing_window: Momentum shift to Broncos, Denver crowd roaring

key_plays: 6:55 PM - Allen to Khalil Shakir 28-yard TD (tie 23-23)
7:32 PM - Allen to Ty Johnson 48-yard TD with 0:00 (tie 30-30!)
q4.social_explosion: 35,000+ mentions/minute as Bills tie with 0:00 on clock
q4.marketing_window: INSANE finish, everyone watching, viral moment

key_plays: 7:38 PM - Both teams punt on opening drives
7:45 PM - Broncos INT of Josh Allen!
7:52 PM - Wil Lutz 40-yard FG - GAME WINNER!

viral_moments: Bills tie game with 0:00 on clock = WILD
Josh Allen fumble in Q3 = turning point
top_marketing_opportunities: Instant classic = highlight content for days
Josh Allen/Bills heartbreak = empathy marketing opportunity
Bo Nix rising star narrative
Overtime drama = 'Never give up' messaging
Buffalo market needs consolation content
Denver market celebration mode

games.title: NFC Divisional Round
games.narrative: Chicago's Cinderella season ends in heartbreak. Rams survive in frigid conditions. Stafford's veteran savvy prevails.
games.key_moment: Both teams INT in OT, then Rams kick game-winning FG

key_plays: 6:38 PM - Bears drive stalls at LAR 28
6:52 PM - Stafford sacked twice, Rams punt
q1.marketing_window: Defensive battle, cold weather dominates storyline

key_plays: 7:18 PM - Caleb Williams to DJ Moore 28-yard TD
7:40 PM - Stafford to Puka Nacua 15-yard TD

halftime.marketing_window: Chicago's first playoff win in years within reach

q3.marketing_window: Bears dominating, Chicago believing in miracle

key_plays: 9:08 PM - Stafford to Kupp 8-yard TD (cut to 17-14)
q4.social_spike: Bears blowing 10-point lead = Chicago heartbreak trending

key_plays: 9:42 PM - Bears punt on opening drive
9:52 PM - Bears drive to LAR 30, but INT by Rams!
9:58 PM - Joshua Karty 36-yard FG - RAMS WIN!
overtime.marketing_window: Bears Cinderella run ends, empathy content needed

viral_moments: Caleb Williams crying on sideline after loss
top_marketing_opportunities: Chicago heartbreak = massive empathy content
Caleb Williams rookie season ends, 'next year' messaging
Stafford veteran clutch = leadership content
Cold weather game = winter durability messaging
Chicago market needs 'proud of this team' content
LA market advances, but muted celebration (road win)

games.title: AFC Wild Card Round
games.matchup: New England Patriots @ Los Angeles Chargers
games.narrative: Patriots defense dominates Justin Herbert and Chargers offense. Drake Maye manages game. Statement road win.
games.key_moment: Patriots defense holds Chargers to 3 points, zero TDs

key_plays: 1:08 PM - Patriots FG after long drive

halftime.marketing_window: Afternoon game = different viewer demo (families, West Coast)

q4.marketing_window: Patriots dominate, statement road playoff win

viral_moments: Chargers completely shut down = Jim Harbaugh hot seat?
SoFi Stadium mostly Patriots fans (LA apathy)
top_marketing_opportunities: Patriots defense = 'Dominant' messaging
Drake Maye playoff arrival = future star narrative
Herbert/Chargers disappointment again = LA market frustration
Low-scoring game = not great for excitement-based marketing
Patriots road win = 'Anywhere, anytime' toughness
Afternoon West Coast game = different demo (families)

common_themes: Overtime games = maximum engagement, no one leaves
Underdog stories drive massive social engagement
Veteran QB clutch = leadership content opportunities

advertiser_strategies.anheuser_busch: Dominates across all games, multiple brands (Budweiser, Bud Light, Michelob, Stella)
advertiser_strategies.automotive: Ford, Chevrolet, Hyundai, Ram heavy across all playoff games
advertiser_strategies.tech: Apple, Google, Samsung battle in every game
advertiser_strategies.food_delivery: Uber Eats, DoorDash, Instacart in every game

timing_patterns.afternoon_games: Different demo (families, West Coast), fewer beer ads, more family-friendly
timing_patterns.evening_games: Peak engagement, premium ad rates, alcohol-heavy
timing_patterns.overtime_games: Extended ad inventory, brands scramble for last-minute spots
timing_patterns.blowouts: Q4 ad value drops as viewers leave
timing_patterns.close_games: Every quarter valuable, no viewer dropoff

geo_targeting_best_practices.winning_team_market: Immediate celebration mode, victory specials, gear sales
geo_targeting_best_practices.losing_team_market: Delay 1-2 hours, empathy tone, 'next year' messaging
geo_targeting_best_practices.neutral_markets: Highlight entertainment value, Super Bowl previews
geo_targeting_best_practices.host_city: Local pride even if team loses, 'great host' messaging

momentum_shift.trigger: Turnover, big defensive play, or scoring run

overtime.trigger: Game tied at end of regulation

weather_event.trigger: Snow, extreme cold, or conditions change
examples: 'Built for harsh conditions like this game'

content_templates.touchdown_celebration: TOUCHDOWN! üèà [Team] scores! Get [X]% off for the next [Y] minutes. Code: [TEAM][NUMBER]
content_templates.overtime_bonus: OVERTIME! Bonus football = Bonus deals! [Specific offer] until game ends.
content_templates.heartbreak_moment: Tough loss, [Team] fans. We're here for you. Use code NEXTYEAR for [consolation offer].
content_templates.weather_game: This game is BRUTAL! Stay warm with our [indoor comfort offer]. #[WeatherHashtag]
content_templates.defensive_battle: Defense wins championships! Just like our [quality/protection product]. #[GameHashtag]

strategies: Home team win = 20% off next visit
restaurants_bars.timing: Activate promotions during game, capture momentum

strategies: Next season gear for losing teams
retail_apparel.timing: Post-game is critical for gear sales

delivery_services.timing: Pre-game, halftime, OT are peak ordering times

automotive_dealers.timing: Week after game for showroom traffic

dataset_usage_guide.for_developers: Use JSON structure to build real-time triggers, parse game events, match commercials to campaigns
dataset_usage_guide.for_marketers: Reference timing windows, viral moments, geo-targeting strategies for campaign planning
dataset_usage_guide.for_business_owners: Identify best games for your industry, pre-plan promotions, automate where possible
dataset_usage_guide.for_analysts: Cross-reference commercial performance, social spikes, viewership patterns
dataset_usage_guide.scalability: Framework works for any sporting event - NCAA, NBA, MLB, World Cup, Olympics
